rows.label: tlk43500142_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm sure you've heard already, but just
to make this clear, there's always a
constant flow of mercenary missions.

rows.label: tlk43500142_04_msg0002
rows.name:
You'll be asked to help out
with things like guard duty,
escort duty, harvesting...

rows.label: tlk43500142_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Remember which missions require the
least effort, because it's never a
bad idea to repeat those ones.

rows.label: tlk43500142_04_msg0004
rows.name:
But no matter the mission,
it's always worth tackling
each one at least once.

rows.label: tlk43500142_04_msg0005
rows.name:
There's always a big reward waiting
for you the first time you finish.
